Direct Known Subclasses:
Polygon, Rectangle
public abstract class Bound
extends java.lang.Object

a generic bounding region

Patrick

create

public static Bound create(int[] x,
                           int[] y)
create a new bound with an array of x-values and an array of y-values. If the points indicate a rectangle it's better to use the other create() method.

y -
Returns:
the bound

create a rectangular bound

getSmallestY

public abstract float getSmallestY(float xVal)
returns the smallest y value within this bound at location x = xVal
in other words, the minimum of the intersection of
vertical line at xVal and the bounded region

Parameters:
xVal -
Returns:
smallest y-value in the bound intersecting
the vertical line x=xVal

setWidth

public abstract void setWidth(float newWidth)
scales the width to be of size newWidth
the leftmost x position remains the same
